name: barley grain production | barley grain | Cutoff, U
description:
ecoQuery: https://ecoquery.ecoinvent.org/3.10/cutoff/dataset/9386/documentation

This dataset represents the production of 1 kg of barley grain (fresh matter). The yield is 7500 kg/ha at a moisture content at storage of 14%.;;[This dataset was already contained in the ecoinvent database version 2. It was not individually updated during the transfer to ecoinvent version 3. Life Cycle Impact Assessment results may still have changed, as they are affected by changes in the supply chain, i.e. in other datasets. This dataset was generated following the ecoinvent quality guidelines for version 2. It may have been subject to central changes described in the ecoinvent version 3 change report (http://www.ecoinvent.org/database/ecoinvent-version-3/reports-of-changes/), and the results of the central updates were reviewed extensively. The changes added e.g. consistent water flows and other information throughout the database. The documentation of this dataset can be found in the ecoinvent reports of version 2, which are still available via the ecoinvent website. The change report linked above covers all central changes that were made during the conversion process.]

This activity starts after the harvest of the previous crop. The inputs of seeds, mineral fertilisers and pesticides are considered. It is assumed that no organic fertilisers are applied.


The dataset includes all machine operations and corresponding machine infrastructure and sheds. Machine operations are: soil cultivation, sowing, fertilisation, weed control, pest and pathogen control, combine-harvest, grain drying and transport from field to farm (4 km). Further, direct field emissions are included. This activity ends after harvest and grain drying at the farm gate.
category: A:Agriculture, forestry and fishing/01:Crop and animal production, hunting and related service activities/011:Growing of non-perennial crops/0111:Growing of cereals (except rice), leguminous crops and oil seeds

processDocumentation.timeDescription: The yield data have been collected for the years 2000-2004.
processDocumentation.geographyDescription: Refers to an average production in the region Saxony-Anhalt (DE).
processDocumentation.technologyDescription: conventional production typical for the region
processDocumentation.samplingDescription: Data come from a survey in the concerted action GL-Pro of the EU (QLK5-CT-2002-02418). Data were compiled from statistics, pilot networks, fertilising recommendations, documents from extension services, information provided by retailers and expert knowledge. The production data were verified and adjusted by a group of experts in GL-Pro and by other experts.

exchanges.description: Total amount of active substance/s of fertilisers needed for the production of 'barley grain' is calculated to be circa 3.17E-02 kg. Fertiliser/s used in this dataset is/are: 'nitrogen fertiliser, as N', 'phosphate fertiliser, as P2O5', 'potassium chloride, as K2O'. The total amount of active substance/s is doubled in order to account for the packaging of the dilluted product of fertiliser/s that is/are applied. Therefore, 6.35E-02 kg of packaging for fertilisers is justified with this exchange.

Total amount of active substance/s of pesticides needed for the production of barley grain is calculated to be circa 1.30E-04 kg. Pesticide/s used in this dataset is/are: 'cyclic N-compound', 'diphenylether-compound', 'pesticide, unspecified', 'pyrethroid-compound'. The total amount of active substance/s is doubled in order to account for the packaging of the dilluted product of pesticide/s that is/are applied. Therefore, 2.60E-04 kg of packaging for pesticides is justified with this exchange.
